home.title: AgriWaste2Fuel
home.subtitle: Smart Farm Waste Tracker
home.description: AI-powered platform to detect farm waste, guide conversion to biogas/compost, and track GHG savings with carbon credit estimation for Indian farmers.

modules.title: Smart Platform Modules
modules.subtitle: Complete solution from waste detection to carbon credit earning for farmers

wasteDetection.title: Waste Detection & Classification
wasteDetection.description: Upload images of agricultural waste or manually enter waste type to get accurate identification and conversion recommendations

biogasRecommendation.title: Biogas/Compost Recommendation
biogasRecommendation.description: Smart decision engine recommends biogas for wet waste or composting for dry waste with step-by-step processing guide

carbonCredits.title: GHG Savings & Carbon Credits
carbonCredits.description: Calculate CO₂ emission savings from waste conversion and estimate potential carbon credit earnings for farmers

projectStatus.title: Project Development Status
projectStatus.subtitle: Currently under development for Annam.ai Internship Program

cta.title: Help Farmers Convert
cta.description: A solution built during Annam.ai Internship Program to address real agricultural waste problems in India

about.title: About AgriWaste2Fuel
about.subtitle: Transforming Agricultural Waste into Sustainable Energy Solutions through AI Innovation

mission.title: Mission
mission.description1: AgriWaste2Fuel is an innovative sustainability platform designed to revolutionize agricultural waste management. Our AI-powered system analyzes agricultural waste through advanced image recognition and natural language processing to provide optimal disposal recommendations.
mission.description2: We bridge the gap between traditional farming practices and modern sustainability solutions, empowering farmers to turn their waste into valuable resources while contributing to environmental conservation.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description1: To create a world where agricultural waste becomes a valuable resource rather than an environmental burden. We envision farmers equipped with cutting-edge technology to make informed decisions about waste management.
vision.description2: Our goal is to contribute to the global fight against climate change by promoting sustainable agricultural practices and helping farmers monetize their waste through carbon credit systems.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: A passionate group of developers, engineers, and innovators working together to make agriculture more sustainable.

input.title: Analyze
input.description: Upload an image or describe your agricultural waste to get AI-powered recommendations for sustainable processing and carbon credit calculations
input.placeholder: Describe your agricultural waste in detail...
input.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

step1.title: Input Your Waste
step1.description: Upload a clear image or describe your agricultural waste type

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: Our AI identifies waste type and optimal processing methods

step3.title: Get Results
step3.description: Receive recommendations, carbon credits, and financial estimates

result.title: Analysis Results
result.subtitle: Comprehensive waste analysis using {{method}} technology
result.impactDescription: By processing your {{wasteType}} through {{method}}, you contribute to sustainable waste management and help reduce environmental impact.
result.analysisSavedDate: Analysis saved to your account on {{date}}

greenhouseGasReduction.title: Greenhouse Gas Reduction
greenhouseGasReduction.description: Prevents methane emissions from waste decomposition

resourceRecovery.title: Resource Recovery
resourceRecovery.description: Creates valuable organic fertilizer as byproduct

result.customProcessingSteps: Detailed processing steps will be customized based on your specific waste type and selected method.
result.startNewAnalysisMessage: Please start a new analysis to see results.

login.title: Farmer Login
login.subtitle: Welcome back to your account
login.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

textInput.title: Describe Your Waste
textInput.subtitle: Enter the type of agricultural waste you want to process
textInput.placeholder: e.g., Rice straw, Wheat stubble, Corn husks...
textInput.proTipDescription: Be as specific as possible. Include details like "Rice straw from harvested paddy" or "Dry corn husks from sweet corn" for better analysis results.

aboutPage.projectDescription: AgriWaste2Fuel is an innovative sustainability platform designed to revolutionize agricultural waste management. Our AI-powered system analyzes agricultural waste through advanced image recognition and natural language processing to provide optimal disposal recommendations.
aboutPage.empowerFarmers: We empower farmers to make data-driven decisions that benefit both their economics and the environment, creating a sustainable future for agriculture.
aboutPage.impactDescription1: Our platform calculates precise environmental impact metrics, including CO₂ savings and carbon credits earned, while providing accurate monetary estimates for sustainable waste processing methods.
aboutPage.impactDescription2: Users receive verifiable certificates documenting their contribution to environmental sustainability, creating a transparent and rewarding ecosystem for green practices.
aboutPage.aiImageRecognitionDesc: Advanced computer vision for accurate waste identification
aboutPage.smartRecommendationsDesc: Optimized processing methods for maximum efficiency
aboutPage.environmentalImpactDesc: Precise CO₂ calculations and sustainability metrics
aboutPage.carbonCreditsDesc: Earn verified credits with accurate financial estimates
aboutPage.hackathonDescription: Developed for the Annam.ai Internship Program 2025, focusing on innovative AI-driven solutions for environmental challenges in modern farming.
aboutPage.readyToTransform: Ready to Transform Your Agricultural Waste?
aboutPage.joinFarmers: Join thousands of farmers who are already converting their agricultural waste into sustainable energy and earning carbon credits.

dashboard.title: Farmer Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeDescription: Welcome to AgriWaste2Fuel. Here you can analyze your agricultural waste.
dashboard.noRecentActivity: No recent activity found. Start your first analysis to see results here.

biogasProduction.title: 🌱 Biogas Production
biogasProduction.description: You can save up to ₹8,000 per month by making biogas from your rice straw.

compostFertilizer.title: ♻️ Compost Fertilizer
compostFertilizer.description: Improve soil quality and increase production by making organic fertilizer.

carbonCredits.title: 🏆 Carbon Credits
carbonCredits.description: Earn carbon credits from your environment-friendly methods.
